about.title: About Me
about.description1: I am an IT expert with many years of international experience in technical support, IT consulting, and software development. Throughout my career, I have worked with numerous companies, building extensive technical expertise – from complex system architectures to efficient infrastructure management.
about.description2: I am particularly skilled in technologies such as Java, JavaScript, Python, SQL, and SAP, as well as operating systems like Linux and Windows. Beyond development, my focus lies on analyzing and optimizing processes to create stable and high-performing solutions.
about.description3: I am fascinated by the topics covered on this platform in the Tech section – such as mathematics, machine learning, or artificial intelligence. At the same time, I also enjoy working on practical tasks like Data Entry, Voice Recording, and Translations.
about.description4: This versatility gave rise to the DataFusionHUB project: A platform that initially starts as static but aims, in the long term, to intelligently connect, normalize, and process various data sources.

LegalNotice.title: Legal Notice
LegalNotice.dialogtext: Here you will find all legal information about the operator of this site.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.text:
Privacy Policy

Your privacy is important to us. It is TechThor's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect on the TechThor website and other sites we own and operate.

Legally Binding Version

Please note that the legally binding version of this privacy policy is the Portuguese version, which complies with Brazil's Lei Geral de Proteção de Dados (LGPD). This translation is provided for informational purposes only.

Your Rights

You have the right to access, correct, delete, restrict processing, and request portability of your personal data. You may also withdraw your consent, where applicable. To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@techthor.com.br.
PrivacyPolicy.dialogtext: Information about your data protection can be found here.

section1.title: Responsible Entity
section1.text: The responsible entity for data processing on this website is TechThor. We operate in accordance with applicable data protection regulations and laws.

section2.title: Legal Notice
section2.text: This website provides information about our services. We accept no liability for the completeness, accuracy, or timeliness of the content.
